Articles.Content: Before wheels broke when you touched them, but now I can bloody reenter at 3000m/s and be fine with wheels as landing gear! Is this a known bug?

Do you mean the wheels are surviving the reentry temps?  I know they break with a significant impact, but reentry heating is not an impact. 

Screenshots would help too.

the "rugged" wheels on my rovers don't survive reentry.

 

Edited February 26, 2018 by Brainlord Mesomorph
